This DT this phrasebook NN phrasebook gives VBZ give an DT an overview NN overview of IN of useful JJ useful phrases NNS phrase in IN in Standard NNP Standard Croatian NNP Croatian . . .

p.s: Croatian JJ Croatian belongs VBZ belong to TO to the DT the " `` " synthetic JJ synthetic " '' " language NN language group NN group , , , which WDT which means VBZ mean that IN that unlike IN unlike English NNP English and CC and other JJ other " `` " analytical JJ analytical " '' " languages NNS language , , , different JJ different grammatical JJ grammatical aspects NNS aspect are VBP be expressed VBN express in IN in one CD one word NN word by IN by changing VBG change the DT the structure NN structure of IN of that DT that word NN word — : — adding VBG add an DT an ending NN ending or CC or prefix NN prefix , , , modifying VBG modify the DT the core NN core of IN of the DT the word NN word , , , etc. FW etc.

In IN in Croatian JJ Croatian , , , one CD one word NN word is VBZ be often RB often sufficient JJ sufficient to TO to express VB express what WP what English NNP English can MD can achieve VB achieve only RB only by IN by using VBG use multiple JJ multiple words NNS word . . .
Croatian JJ Croatian uses VBZ use the DT the Latin JJ Latin alphabet NN alphabet . . .

The DT the spelling NN spell of IN of Croatian JJ Croatian is VBZ be largely RB largely phonetic JJ phonetic so RB so most JJS most words NNS word are VBP be written VBN write exactly RB exactly as IN as they PRP they are VBP be pronounced VBN pronounce . . .
